TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED STORES NAMES ANN TAYLOR DIVISION OFFICER
TEXT.BODY:
<Allied Stores Corp> named Michele Fortune president and division chief executive officer of its Ann Taylor division stores. Allied said Fortune is currently senior vice president-merchandising of <Lord and Taylor> of New York.
Reuter
